snippet: At a Washington coffeehouse, four third-party candidates sparred at an event moderated by the most famous third-party candidate in recent memory, Ralph Nader.
abstract: Third-party presidential candidates Gary Johnson of Libertarian Party, Jill Stein of Green Party, Rocky Anderson of Justice Party and Virgil Goode of Constitution Party spar at debate in Washington coffeehouse moderated by Ralph Nader.
lead_paragraph: At a Washington coffeehouse, four third-party candidates sparred at an event moderated by the most famous third-party candidate in recent memory, Ralph Nader.

headline.seo: In This Presidential Debate, Four Third-Party Hopefuls
headline.main: Another Presidential Debate, but This Time the Candidates Are Much Less Familiar
headline.print_headline: Another Presidential Debate, But This Time the Candidates Are Much Less Familiar

keywords.value: Green Party of the United States
